reset_statistics_text:
All statistics
will be lost.

Do you want
to reset them?
start_new_game_text:
Are you sure
you want to
start a new game?

All your progress
will lost!
start_tutorial_text:
Do you want to
start tutorial?
You will learn
how to play!
store_download_android: Download this app from Google Play
store_download_ios: Download this app from Apple Store
store_download_microsoft: Download this app from Microsoft Store
tutorial_1: Connect multiple bubbles with the same color
tutorial_2: Connect 4 bubbles into a squre to fire the Color Bomb
tutorial_3: Connect 4 bubbles horizontally to fire the Line Bomb
tutorial_4: Connect 5 bubbles to spawn the Wildcard Bubble
tutorial_5: Wildcard Bubble can connect two bubbles in any color
tutorial_6: Remove Bomb before it counts to 0. Otherwise you lose
tutorial_7: Awesome, now you are ready to play Bubble Connect
you_are_on: You are on {counter} place in global rank
will_back: Yes, But I Will Be Back
